Class Board

java.lang.Object
  Board

public class Board
extends Object

This class stores information about the board. It contains a 2D array of the board, made up of individual Cave spots.

Author:
YOU

Constructor Detail

Board

public Board(int rows,
             int cols)
Generate a random game board of size rows x cols. The top left and bottom right should always be open (the adventurer will start in the top left and the treasure will be in the bottom right). Otherwise, each spot should be generated with the following probability:

  • Open 50%
  • Blocked 20%
  • Pit 20%
  • Teleport 10%

Method Detail

getCave

public Cave getCave(int r,
                    int c)
Get the cave at location (r,c).

Returns:
The Cave stored at this location, or null if this spot is not on the board.

ok

public boolean ok(int r,
                  int c)
Check if this location is inside the bounds of the board.

Returns:
Returns true if this spot is within the bounds of the defined board, false otherwise.

getUnoccupiedOpenLocation

public Cave getUnoccupiedOpenLocation()
Get a random unoccupied, open location from the current state of the game board. Guaranteed not to return the location of the treasure.

Returns:
The Cave stored at the random location chosen. Will be unoccupied and open.
